original_text: And the napkin, that was about his head, not lying with the linen clothes, but wrapped together in a place by itself.
korean_text: 또 머리를 쌌던 수건은 세마포와 함께 놓이지 않고 딴 곳에 쌌던 대로 놓여 있더라

sentences.original_text: And the napkin, that was about his head
not lying with the linen clothes
but wrapped together in a place by itself
sentences.korean_translation: 따로 한 곳에 함께 감겨 있더라
